title: $750 Off 1st Full Month!!
posting_body: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live.
We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach.
Where you live, is where you come alive.
In an area filled with convenience, recreation, and possibility, Avalon North Creek offers one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments for lease.
Entertain in our spacious living spaces with modern kitchens and quartz countertops.
Live effortlessly with amenities that include a fitness center with studio space, resident lounge, and courtyard with pool and gas grills.

Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more.
Avalon North Creek is within the Northshore School District and located near area trails and wineries.
We’re also convenient to SR 527 providing access to nearby Bothell, Redmond, Everett, and Seattle.
This is not just apartment living.
